answers.answer: I'm gluten and lactose intolerant too :) no gd though, luckily! I also cook everything from scratch. What type of recipe are you after? Something sweet I'm guessing! But with no sugar?Fruit is your best friend, just avoid fruits with lots of sugar (banana, grapes, figs...).. You can freeze some fruits and put them in the mixer with some soy milk for a milkshake
